title: Run SamsaRaLight radiative balance — run_sl
text: sl_stand object class "sl_stand" describing forest stand, created create_sl_stand. contains trees, sensors, terrain, grid geometry. monthly_radiations data.frame monthly horizontal radiation (Hrad, MJ m\(^{-2}\)) diffuse--global ratio (DGratio), typically obtained using get_monthly_radiations checked using check_monthly_radiations.. sensors_only Logical. TRUE, compute light interception sensors (much faster). use_torus Logical. TRUE, stand borders treated using torus (periodic) geometry, mimicking infinite forest, representative virtual stand. FALSE, borders open (surrounded grassland). turbid_medium Logical. TRUE, tree crowns treated turbid medium (Beer–Lambert law using crown_lad). FALSE, crowns treated porous envelopes (using crown_openness). detailed_output Logical. TRUE, output contains detailed diffuse/direct energies light datasets, full interception matrices interceptions output ray discretization monthy_rays. FALSE, total energies returned (recommended uses). parallel_mode logical. TRUE, ray–target computations parallelised using OpenMP. FALSE, model runs single-thread mode. SamsaRaLight uses OpenMP ray–target parallelisation. avoid competition OpenMP BLAS (matrix algebra libraries), BLAS automatically forced single-thread mode simulation. Using parallel_mode = TRUE strongly recommended large stands fine ray discretisation, computation time scales almost linearly number available CPU cores. n_threads integer NULL. Number CPU threads use parallel_mode = TRUE. NULL (default), OpenMP automatically selects number available cores. provided, must positive integer. verbose Logical; TRUE, informative messages printed.

Higher values increase interception (default = 0.5). clumping_factor Numeric scalar controlling aggregation leaves within crown volume. value 1 corresponds homogeneous (random) foliage distribution; values < 1 indicate clumped foliage, values > 1 indicate regular spacing. modifies effective light interception turbid medium model (default = 1). trunk_interception logical, TRUE, account trunk interception height_anglemin numeric, minimum altitude angle rays (degrees) direct_startoffset numeric, starting angle first direct ray (degrees) direct_anglestep numeric, hour angle step direct rays (degrees) diffuse_anglestep numeric, hour angle step diffuse rays (degrees) soc logical, TRUE, use Standard Overcast Sky; FALSE, Uniform Overcast Sky start_day integer, first day vegetative period (1–365) end_day integer, last day vegetative period (1–365) detailed_output logical, TRUE, include detailed rays, energies, interception matrices parallel_mode logical. TRUE, ray–target computations parallelised using OpenMP. FALSE, model runs single-thread mode. n_threads integer NULL. Number CPU threads use parallel_mode = TRUE. NULL (default), OpenMP automatically selects number available cores. provided, must positive integer. verbose Logical; TRUE, informative messages printed.
